briefTitle: Long-term Outcome of HER2-amplified Metastatic Breast Cancer: A Retrospective Analysis
officialTitle: Long-term Outcome of HER2-amplified Metastatic Breast Cancer: A Retrospective Analysis
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Received at least 1 dose of trastuzumab in metastatic setting at the University hospital of Zurich from 01/2004 to 12/2014.
* HER2+ status confirmed by immunohistochemistry (IHC) 3+ or fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) ≥ 2.

Exclusion Criteria:

-
